CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: It is clear that the PBDT-TDPP-S:PC71BM - based devices exhibited better photovoltaic properties as compared to the PBDT-TDPP-S:PC61BM - based devices , which can be attributed to the stronger absorption of PC71BM than PC61BM in the visible region from 440 to 530 nm , as shown in Figure 1b.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S:PC71BM |
| PC71BM |
| PBDT-TDPP-S:PC61BM |
| PC61BM |

The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are: "PBDT-TDPP-S:PC71BM", "PC71BM", "PBDT-TDPP-S:PC61BM", and "PC61BM".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S:PC71BM |
| PC71BM |
| PBDT-TDPP-S:PC61BM |
| PC61BM |

After reviewing the paragraph again, all identified entities are clear "Material Name" references and no entities need to be removed. The table above presents the valid "Material Name" entities.
